text: The 2019 Transplant Games were a multi-sport event held from 17 to 23 August 2019, in Newcastle-Gateshead, United Kingdom. They were the 22nd edition of the World Transplant Games. The games were organised by the World Transplant Games Federation (WTGF) and NewcastleGateshead Initiative. == Participating nations == * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * == Sports == === Individual sports === * 18px Athletics * 18px Road Race (5 km) * 18px Badminton * 18px Bowling * 18px Cycling * 18px Darts * 18px Golf * 18px Kayak * 18px Swimming * 18px Pétanque * 18px Squash * 18px Table Tennis * 18px Tennis * 18px Virtual Triathlon === Team sports === * 18x18px Basketball (3 on 3) * 18x18px Football * 18x18px Volleyball ==Medal table== Medals were awarded to the following countries: ==References== == External links == * * Category:Transplant Games Summer Transplant Games Summer Transplant Games Category:Sport in Newcastle upon Tyne Category:Multi-sport events in the United Kingdom Category:2019 in multi-sport events Category:21st century in Newcastle upon Tyne
title: 2019 Summer Transplant Games
